title: Carry Trade, Commodities Make EM Currencies More Stable Than G-7
description: Emerging-market currencies are proving more stable than those in developed nations, a streak some investors say could become the longest in more than two decades.
content: Emerging-market currencies are proving more stable than those in developed nations, a streak some investors say could become the longest in more than two decades.
